page.title: 08INDUSTRY - OWERSBY
page.content: There are only 2 industries within the area both agriculturally based-the Saw Mills and the Old Forge.The Saw Mills buy in home grown wood of all types and the 5-6 self-employed workers make and erect whatever is required eg trad -itional Lincolnshire fencing with oak posts and larch rails,garden fencing panels,field gates,garden sheds and stables and firewood.Sawdust and waste wood are now heating glass-houses to raise plants for sale. What was once the Blacksmith's is now a thriving bus -iness inventing and making machinery, such as the new pea and bean washer, for the vegetable processing market.A cauliflower floretting mach.is now at work in S.Africa,Israel,Turkey,France and Portugal as well as throughout the United Kingdom.The work force of 10 is also happy to mend older machines or indeed weld a broken lawnmower part.
